TopicTitle: OX Solar Panels are not obstructed by closed Service Bay Doors

Articles.Content:
see title, happens with all my craft, no energy is consumed, as long as ox panels are inside the service bay, regardless the fact that the

doors are closed, unless i oversaw something i can't imagine this is intended
This is (now) a known issue. [Other linked reports](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118871-OX-STAT-work-inside-closed-Service-Bay?p=1896810&viewfull=1#post1896810).
